entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. A few flurries near the British Columbia border this evening and overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
